content.raw:
This introduced some cppcheck [warnings](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/12330) into default:

~~~
[plugins/ActorPlugin.cc:28]: (warning) Member variable 'ActorPlugin::targetWeight' is not initialized in the constructor.
[plugins/ActorPlugin.cc:28]: (warning) Member variable 'ActorPlugin::obstacleWeight' is not initialized in the constructor.
[plugins/ActorPlugin.cc:28]: (warning) Member variable 'ActorPlugin::animationFactor' is not initialized in the constructor.
~~~
content.html:
This introduced some cppcheck warnings into default:

[plugins/ActorPlugin.cc:28]: (warning) Member variable 'ActorPlugin::targetWeight' is not initialized in the constructor.
[plugins/ActorPlugin.cc:28]: (warning) Member variable 'ActorPlugin::obstacleWeight' is not initialized in the constructor.
[plugins/ActorPlugin.cc:28]: (warning) Member variable 'ActorPlugin::animationFactor' is not initialized in the constructor.
